name: 6th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies
content: Magnus Group cordially invites you to share in the 6th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies, (TRADITIONAL MED 2024) which will be held in Paris, France, from June 20–22, 2024\. The subject for this global Conference is “Navigating the Future of Healthcare and Humankind Through the Healing Power of Nature” We extend an assignation to all professors, Herbal medicine businesses, and experimenters in the field of traditional drug. The main focus of this conference is on the most recent and fascinating inventions in all fields of indispensable drug. This Traditional Medicine Conferences platform offers the finest chance for people to change their knowledge and moxie. An interdisciplinary group of experts from the fields of Traditional Medicine and Alternative Medicine will come together at Ethnomedicine Conferences. Experimenters in traditional drug, interpreters, herbalists, acupuncturists, homeopaths, professors, directors, and youthful experimenters were among the major professional groups represented. The Traditional Medicine Conference development of traditional and indispensable drug is expanding snappily.
